2026 On-Cycle

Private Equity Recruiting 2026

On-cycle PE recruiting timeline for 2026. When megafunds, upper middle market, and growth equity firms recruit first-year banking analysts.

Get 2026 PE PlaybookView Timeline

2026 on-cycle could start as early as August 2025. If you're a first-year analyst, start preparing now.

2026 On-Cycle Timeline

For analysts starting in Summer 2025, recruiting for 2027 start dates.

1

Headhunter Outreach

Late Summer 2025

HHs start reaching out to analysts at top banks 3-6 months into their analyst programs

  • CPI, SG Partners, Henkel start calls
  • First-year analysts get initial outreach
  • Build relationships with key headhunters
  • Update resume and start studying
2

Process Kicks Off

September-October 2025

On-cycle processes begin in earnest with compressed timelines

  • Headhunters schedule first rounds
  • Processes run Friday-Sunday
  • Multiple funds interview same weekend
  • LBO modeling tests administered
3

Superdays & Offers

October-November 2025

Final rounds and exploding offers with 24-48 hour deadlines

  • In-person superdays at fund offices
  • Case studies and deal discussions
  • Offers extended (often same day)
  • Exploding deadlines are norm
4

Off-Cycle Continues

Q1-Q2 2026

Firms that didn't fill or new openings recruit off-cycle

  • Middle market PE more active
  • Growth equity firms recruit
  • Some megafunds do second rounds
  • More time but still competitive

When Each Tier Recruits

TierExample FirmsTimingNotes
MegafundsKKR, Blackstone, Apollo, Carlyle, TPGSept-Oct (earliest)Most compressed, 24hr deadlines
Upper MMAdvent, Hellman, TA, SummitOct-NovSlightly more time to decide
Middle MarketAudax, GTCR, RiversideNov-FebOften off-cycle or rolling
Growth EquityGeneral Atlantic, TA, SummitRollingLess structured process
Sector FocusedVista, Thoma Bravo, FranciscoOct-DecTechnical focus varies by sector

What's Different in 2026

The PE recruiting landscape continues to evolve.

Even Earlier Start

Some megafunds are starting outreach to strong candidates within 2-3 months of analyst start dates. The arms race continues.

AI in Screening

Headhunters increasingly use data to identify candidates earlier. Your deal experience and bank pedigree matter from day one.

Modeling Test Evolution

LBO tests are getting more complex. Expect add-ons, dividend recaps, and sensitivity analysis beyond basic mechanics.

Culture Fit Emphasis

With smaller teams, culture fit is weighted heavily. Prepare thoughtful answers on why specific funds.

Bank → PE Placement

Which banks place best into PE? Your bank matters for on-cycle success.

Goldman Sachs

TMT and Sponsors groups place especially well

High
Morgan Stanley

M&A and coverage groups strong

High
JP Morgan

Large analyst class, many place

High
Evercore

Top placement rate to megafunds

Very High
PJT Partners

Strong Rx placement

Very High
Centerview

Small class but excellent placement

Very High
Lazard

Rx analysts place very well

High
Moelis

Consistent placement across groups

High

Prepare for On-Cycle

On-cycle moves fast. LBO tests happen in hours. Be ready before headhunters call.
